DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial compare two psychological treatment back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Tailored Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy Chronic Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective examine incremental efficacy patient-centered tailored self-management treatment approach , Tailored Cognitive-Behavior Therapy ( TCBT ) , person chronic musculoskeletal pain . TCBT compare Standard Cognitive- Behavior Therapy ( SCBT ) condition . The hypothesis TCBT associate improved outcome follow treatment . Outcome assess multiple standardized measure key domain chronic pain experience . Secondary objective examine process successful self-management treatment .
DOC.criteria: Chronic back pain least 6 month Treatment medication physical therapy Acute life threaten physical illness Current alcohol substance abuse dependence Current psychosis suicidal ideation treatment anesthesiology , chiropractic care surgery
